directions: Mix water, cream of mushroom soup, chicken, onion, celery, carrots, baby bell peppers, and onion soup mix together in a slow cooker.
Cook on Low for 6 to 8 hours. Shred chicken using two forks and stir soup well.
ingredients: 1 (10.75 ounce) can condensed cream of mushroom soup
1 (1 ounce) package dry onion soup mix (such as Lipton®)
title: Easy Slow Cooker Chicken Soup
